summary: The 'Building Civic Bridges Act' (H.R. 4329) proposes to amend the National and Community Service Act of 1990 to establish an Office of Civic Bridgebuilding within the Corporation for National and Community Service. This office will administer a grant program to support civic bridgebuilding initiatives across the U.S., focusing on reducing conflict, improving social cohesion, and addressing public concerns. The bill also mandates research and dissemination of best practices, a consultation process for stakeholders, and a pilot grant program. Funding is intended to come from donations, not federal funds.
